title: History Meets Modern Luxe in the Heart of Edinburgh
description: Gaze over the Edinburgh skyline in old-word meets modern luxe style at the Principal Edinburgh George Street. Stay in classic Georgian elegance and spoil yourself with daily breakfast, £30 per person dining credits, a glass of champagne upon arrival and complimentary Wi-Fi.
location_description: The Principal Edinburgh George Street
offer_address: 19 - 21 George St, Edinburge EH2 2PB

vendor_name: Radisson Collection Hotel, Royal Mile Edinburgh
title: Boutique Designer Stay in the City’s Historical Centre
description: Discover classic Scottish history infused with quirky local art and vibrant bursts of colour at the Radisson Collection Hotel, Royal Mile Edinburgh - ideally nestled at the charismatic intersection of some of Edinburgh’s most iconic streets and just a stone’s throw from captivating Edinburgh Castle. Uncover the medieval magic of Scotland’s capital and enjoy an à la carte breakfast each day, feast on one decadent dinner and be welcomed by an in-room treat on arrival.
location_description: Radisson Collection Hotel, Royal Mile Edinburgh
offer_address: 1 George IV Bridge, Edinburgh EH1 1AD, UK

title: Luxe Stay in the Heart of Historic Edinburgh
description: Discover the historic charm of Edinburgh with a stay at the stylish Ten Hill Place Hotel. Set right in the heart of Scotland’s capital, but on a quiet road away from the city’s hustle and bustle, this charming property is the perfect base for exploring. It takes just ten minutes to walk to the famous Edinburgh Castle and the many shopping options on Princes Street. Daily breakfast will set you up for sightseeing, while a dining credit towards a sumptuous dinner at the hotel’s award-winning restaurant adds a touch of decadence to your escape.
location_description: Ten Hill Place Hotel - OLD
offer_address: 10 Hill Place, Edinburgh EH8 9DS, United Kingdom

title: Scottish Heritage Meets Contemporary Luxury in the Heart of the City
description: Experience the beauty and romance of Scotland’s capital, Edinburgh, staying at the newly-refurbished Principal Edinburgh Charlotte Square in the heart of the city. Housed in a series of grand Georgian buildings, this award-winning hotel perfectly marries Scottish heritage with contemporary luxury. Your escape includes daily buffet and a la carte breakfast in the beautiful glass-encased eatery The Garden, access to the hotel’s spa featuring a pool, gym, steam room and more, a drink voucher and Principal’s signature tuck box of treats in your room.
location_description: The Principal Edinburgh Charlotte Square
offer_address: 38 Charlotte Square, Edinburgh EH2 4HQ, UK

title: Historic Charm in the Heart of Edinburgh
description: Experience high-end boutique luxury in the heart of beautiful Edinburgh at the Nira Caledonia hotel. Located in a stunning 19th-century building, this unique property sits in the heart of Edinburgh’s UNESCO World Heritage-listed centre. Included in your escape is a complimentary Executive Room upgrade, a daily full Scottish and continental breakfast buffet, a GBP25 food & beverage credit and more.
location_description: Nira Caledonia
offer_address: 6-10 Gloucester Pl, Edinburgh EH3 6EF, UK

title: Luxe Stay in the Heart of Historic Edinburgh
description: Discover the historic charm of Edinburgh with a stay at the stylish Ten Hill Place. Set right in the heart of Scotland’s capital, but on a quiet road away from the city’s hustle and bustle, this charming property is the perfect base for exploring. It takes just ten minutes to walk to the famous Edinburgh Castle and the many shopping options on Princes Street. Daily breakfast will set you up for sightseeing, while a sumptuous dinner at the hotel’s award-winning restaurant and a welcome drink add a touch of decadence to your escape.
location_description: Ten Hill Place
offer_address: 10 Hill Place, Edinburgh EH8 9DS, United Kingdom

title: Boutique Self-Contained Edinburgh Apartment Stay near the Royal Mile & Arthurs Seat
description:
Explore Scotland's vibrant capital from the comfort of a self-contained boutique apartment, blending heritage charm and modern comfort. Located in the heart of Edinburgh, this heritage apartment stay offers seamless access to sights like Arthur's Seat, the Palace of Holyroodhouse and the famous Royal Mile, one of Europe's best sightseeing walks with shopping, restaurants and bars.

Filled with history and designed with luxury in mind, the building's pink lime-mortar coating is a rough-cast finish that has been used in Scottish construction for hundreds of years. Each of the nine beautifully designed apartments is truly unique and full of character, renovated within the fabric of a 15th-century building boasting more than 500 years of history.
location_description: Cheval Abbey Strand Apartments at Holyrood
offer_address: 2 Abbey Strand, Edinburgh EH8 8DU, United Kingdom

title: Edinburgh Airport Escape with Lounge & Bar
description: Hit the ground running when you stay at Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh Airport, an IHG Hotel, located just a five-minute drive from the airport which means you can start your holiday right away. When you're not bouncing between Edinburgh Castle, The Royal Mile and Princes Street on a sightseeing expedition, or watching a live match at Murrayfield Stadium (just a 20-minute drive away), stay in and enjoy a pint or a hot coffee at the Great Room lounge.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 101 Ingliston Road, Edinburgh, EH28 8AU, United Kingdom

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh City Ctr
title: Cosy UK City Break near Edinburgh Castle & Palace of Holyrood
description: Step back in time, wander through Edinburgh's historic Old Town, and relax at the end of the day in comfort with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Discover royally beautiful sights - from Edinburgh Castle to the Palace of Holyroodhouse - and indulge in exciting shopping trips and premium dining along Princes Street and George Street. Fuel up for a day of sightseeing with a spot of breakfast at Great Room, or unwind with a refreshing drink in the Lounge Bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Picardy Place, Edinburgh, EH1 3JT United Kingdom

title: Ultra-Luxe Heritage Escape in the heart of Edinburgh
description:
Experience high-end boutique luxury in the heart of beautiful Edinburgh at Nira Caledonia. Located in a stunning 19th-century building, this unique property sits in the heart of Edinburgh’s UNESCO World Heritage-listed centre, close to bustling Princes Street, but tucked away down a quiet, cobbled lane. You truly get the best of both worlds at Nira Caledonia, offering privacy, while also being just a stroll away from top attractions such as the Royal Botanic Garden, Gilmerton Cove and the famous Edinburgh Castle.

Recently refurbished, this unique property is a Small Luxury Hotels of the World member and was awarded the Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice Award 2020. Art Deco furnishings complement the property’s historic charm, while luxe touches include complimentary shoe-shining, 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and the Blackwood’s Bar & Grill.
location_description: Nira Caledonia
offer_address: 6-10 Gloucester Pl, Edinburgh EH3 6EF, UK

title: Stylish Edinburgh City Break Near Zoo & Castle Rock
description: Discover the best of Scotland’s historic capital with a stay at Holiday Inn Edinburgh, an IHG Hotel, flanked by the rolling green fields of Corstorphine Hill and positioned just minutes from auld Edinburgh Castle. Witness the United Kingdom’s only giant panda enclosure at Edinburgh Zoo, conveniently adjacent to the hotel, and return to laidback bites and craft brews at the onsite restaurant or time spent at the expansive onsite Spirit Health Club.
location_description: Holiday Inn Edinburgh, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 132 Corstorphine Road, Edinburgh, EH12 6UA, United Kingdom

title: Edinburgh Sophisticated Stay near Verdant London Road Gardens
description: Adjacent to the leafy green London Road Gardens, voco Edinburgh - Royal Terrace, an IHG Hotel, is a sophisticated urban retreat on the edge of Edinburgh's New Town. Invigorate your body at the fitness centre or embark on an expedition to discover vibrant shopping streets, sprawling gardens and impressive monuments within walking distance. Then, sip a Scottish whisky in the Lounge Bar or savour delicious dishes at the Terrace Restaurant while enjoying serene garden views.
location_description: voco Edinburgh - Royal Terrace, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 18 Royal Terrace, Edinburgh EH7 5AQ, United Kingdom

title: Modern Edinburgh Urban Escape Minutes from Haymarket Station
description: In the heart of Edinburgh's city centre, Holiday Inn Edinburgh - City West, an IHG Hotel is an urban oasis perfect for rest and relaxation after a day of sightseeing. Start your day with a hearty breakfast before departing to see the sights of Scotland's capital. Tour the Palace of Holyrood House, take a verdant stroll through the Royal Botanic Gardens or the Edinburgh Zoo before experiencing this city's vibrant nightlife or returning for a smooth scotch at the lounge bar or a crisp pint in the beer garden.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh - City West, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 107 Queensferry Road, Edinburgh EH4 3HL, United Kingdom

title: Contemporary Scotland City Break in the Heart of Edinburgh
description: Explore Edinburgh's ancient delights by day and retire to modern luxury by night at voco Edinburgh - Haymarket, an IHG Hotel. This stylish property is just a short walk from Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street and Princes Street Gardens, but when you're not out and about, stay in to enjoy delicious bites at The Blossom Restaurant & Bar, or work up a sweat at the onsite fitness centre.
location_description: voco Edinburgh - Haymarket, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 46 Torphichen St, Edinburgh, EH3 8JB, Scotland, United Kingdom

title: Heritage Scotland Retreat near Iconic Edinburgh Castle
description: A contemporary blend of modernity and Victorian heritage, the Hotel Indigo Edinburgh, an IHG Hotel, is ideally positioned in the heart of Edinburgh. Set behind the Georgian facade of five original residential properties, you'll notice small touches throughout the hotel's design paying homage to Edinburgh's history. Enjoy exploring the elegant culture of Scotland's capital, and when you're ready to retreat, the hotel's Turquoise Thistle Bar & Lounge awaits with a selection of speciality whiskies and gins.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Edinburgh, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 51-59 York Place, Edinburgh EH1 3JD, United Kingdom

title: Boutique Edinburgh Hotel Minutes from St Andrew Square & Edinburgh Castle
description: In the heart of New Town, Hotel Indigo Edinburgh - Princes Street, an IHG Hotel, offers a comfortable and contemporary stay ideally situated for shopping and sightseeing. Energise yourself with a visit to the fitness centre, sample a smooth Scottish whiskey at Juniper bar and lounge or explore the upscale boutiques of Princes Street. As evening approaches, spacious and stylish guest rooms beckon, a refined retreat ideal for rest and relaxation after an energetic expedition into Edinburgh.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Edinburgh - Princes Street, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 20 Princes Street, Edinburgh, EH2 2AN United Kingdom

title: Boutique Self-Contained Edinburgh Apartments on The Royal Mile with Onsite Bar, Restaurant & Gym
description:
Discover Edinburgh's old-world charm at Cheval Old Town Chambers, where contemporary comforts meet timeless tradition. Tucked away within the city’s iconic Old Town, these beautifully appointed apartments are directly on the Royal Mile and just moments from Edinburgh Castle, St Giles' Cathedral and Arthurs’ Seat.

Housed in centuries-old buildings, each spacious oasis offers homey comforts, with Luckenbooths Bar & Restaurant just downstairs for when cravings or cocktail hour calls. Whether you're admiring original stonework, timber beams or city views, every detail celebrates the unique character and history of this remarkable location.
location_description: Cheval Old Town Chambers
offer_address: Royal Mile, High Street 329, Edinburgh EH1 1PN, United Kingdom

title: Edinburgh Heritage Escape with Brasserie-Style Restaurant
description: The charms of yesteryear perfectly harmonise with modern facilities and contemporary luxuries at The InterContinental Edinburgh The George, a hotel that has been welcoming guests through its doors since 1881. After wandering the cobbled streets of the Royal Mile, return to this stunning Georgian-style palace and head to The Printing Press Bar & Kitchen for a meal and a single malt whisky, or sip flutes of bubbly at Taittinger Champagne Bar for a taste of a more refined era.
location_description: InterContinental Edinburgh the George, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 19-21 George St, Edinburgh EH2 2PB, United Kingdom

title: Top-Rated Five-Star Edinburgh Escape in the West End
description:
Immerse yourself in the rich medieval history, enchanting castles and charming pub-lined streets of Edinburgh with a five-star stay at The Roseate Edinburgh, ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor.

The 19th-century Victorian townhouses make the perfect base for Edinburgh adventures. With 35 contemporary rooms and suites across two buildings, The Roseate Edinburgh showcase the best of neoclassical-inspired glamour, with subtle nods to history. Each of the beautifully appointed spaces features cutting-edge comforts including deep bathtubs in selected rooms, plush sofas and homemade shortbread for a memorable touch. Savour seasonal Scottish produce at the onsite restaurant, have a drink at The Ba’ Bar - home to some of the best rare and vintage whiskies in Edinburgh - or try the Garden Bar for a drink surrounded by perfectly manicured grounds.

Roam the cobbled alleyways, where there's something to excite travellers of all styles. Explore Old Town for a glimpse of the past, breathe in the fresh air at the top of Arthurs Seat, enjoy a tipple of whisky at the historic pubs or make your way out to portside Leith to unearth boutique shops and top-notch restaurants.
location_description: The Roseate Edinburgh
offer_address: The Roseate Edinburgh, 4 W Coates, Edinburgh EH12 5JQ, United Kingdom

title: Edinburgh Heritage Escape in UNESCO World Heritage-Listed New Town
description: Explore Edinburgh's UNESCO World Heritage-listed New Town from the Georgian-style Kimpton Charlotte Square Hotel, an IHG Hotel, a renovated heritage escape. Expect polished wooden furnishings, luxury fabrics and eye-popping colours, as well as a magical inner courtyard with a cocktail bar - perfect for an afternoon tipple. Treat yourself to a meal at the acclaimed Middle Eastern restaurant, BABA, before indulging in a pampering treatment at the Spa at Charlotte Square.
location_description: Kimpton Charlotte Square, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 38 Charlotte Square, Edinburgh EH2 4HQ, United Kingdom

title: Rich in History and Centrally-Located Edinburgh Stay with Restaurant and Chic Cocktail Bar
description:
Experience the splendour of Scottish heritage with an elegant stay at this sanctuary located in the heart of Edinburgh's St Andrew Square. This five-star abode is housed in a restored bank and offers the perfect blend of classic architecture and modern luxury. With on-site facilities such as a restaurant, cocktail bar and fitness centre, this is the perfect base to kick start your Edinburgh adventures.

Savour the delights of the city's renowned culinary scene at the fourth-floor Register Club and tuck into seafood delights at Hawksmoor Steak & Seafood Restaurant, or enjoy elevated fusion dishes at Lady Libertine. Explore Edinburgh with Princes Street Gardens, the world-famous Edinburgh Castle and the Royal Mile all nearby.
location_description: Cheval The Edinburgh Grand
offer_address: 42 St Andrew Square, Edinburgh EH2 2AD, United Kingdom
